tests.name: test_degenerate_case_with_a_single_a_row
tests.message: expected result to be A, got B
tests.test_code:
result := rows('A')
defer delete(result)
expected := "A"
testing.expect_value(t, result, expected)

tests.name: test_degenerate_case_with_no_row_containing_3_distinct_groups_of_spaces
tests.message:
expected result to be  A 
B B
 A , got  B 
C C
 B
tests.test_code:
result := rows('B')
defer delete(result)
expected := " A \n" + "B B\n" + " A "
testing.expect_value(t, result, expected)

tests.name: test_smallest_non_degenerate_case_with_odd_diamond_side_length
tests.message:
expected result to be   A  
 B B 
C   C
 B B 
  A  , got   B  
 C C 
D   D
 C C 
  B
tests.test_code:
result := rows('C')
defer delete(result)
expected := "  A  
" + " B B 
" + "C   C
" + " B B 
" + "  A  "
testing.expect_value(t, result, expected)

tests.name: test_smallest_non_degenerate_case_with_even_diamond_side_length
tests.message:
expected result to be    A   
  B B  
 C   C 
D     D
 C   C 
  B B  
   A   , got    B   
  C C  
 D   D 
E     E
 D   D 
  C C  
   B
tests.test_code:
result := rows('D')
defer delete(result)
expected :=
"   A   \n" +
"  B B  \n" +
" C   C \n" +
"D     D\n" +
" C   C \n" +
"  B B  \n" +
"   A   "
testing.expect_value(t, result, expected)
